name: Sonic
description: Sonic is a high throughput EVM layer with a rollup to Ethereum. This allows the network to combine the low cost, scalability and speed of a layer-1 with the security of a layer-2 bridge for access to native ETH and other assets on Ethereum. The Sonic network provides users and dApps capabilities such as backward compatibility with EVM, improved speed on top of our benchmarked performance, and increased security.
